image.alt: Dr. Mark Coreil and team at Coreil Orthodontics in Lafayette

paragraphs.text: Coreil Orthodontics provides premier orthodontic care to patients in Lafayette and the Acadiana area. Our team treats every patient as a guest in our home, offering a family atmosphere, individualized treatment plans, and a commitment to keeping each patient’s best interests at heart.
We combine advanced orthodontic technology with compassionate, convenient care, including virtual appointments and same‑day treatment starts that help you get a confident smile with fewer delays.

items.title: Specialist-Led Care

image.alt: Dr. Mark Coreil consulting with a patient

items.text: Board‑certified orthodontist Dr. Mark Coreil leads individualized treatment planning to deliver predictable, high‑quality results.

items.title: Virtual Appointments

image.alt: Virtual orthodontic consultation and remote monitoring

items.text: Virtual consultations and remote monitoring (DentalMonitoring) let you start treatment or check progress with fewer in‑office visits.

items.title: Flexible Payments
items.text: In‑house no‑interest plans plus CareCredit and Alphaeon options help make treatment affordable and fit your budget.

items.title: Same-Day Starts
items.text: Convenient scheduling and a family atmosphere make it easy to begin care quickly and comfortably.

paragraphs.text: Mark N. Coreil, DDS is a board‑certified orthodontist and Associate Professor of Clinical Orthodontics at LSU School of Dentistry. He earned his DDS from Louisiana State University School of Dentistry in 1986 and completed his orthodontic specialty training at LSU in 1988, with additional advanced clinical training completed in 1993. With more than 25 years of experience treating complex craniofacial and cleft cases, Dr. Coreil is active on the Children’s Hospital of New Orleans Cleft & Craniofacial Team and lectures nationally on clinical orthodontic techniques.

image.alt: Dr. Mark Coreil, Board Certified orthodontist

paragraphs.text: Coreil Orthodontics works closely with cleft and craniofacial teams, pediatric dentists, ENTs, and myofunctional therapists to provide early interceptive care and coordinated treatment plans. Our approach supports growth, breathing, and developmental needs for children and teens as part of comprehensive care.

image.alt: Pediatric orthodontic care at Coreil Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: From traditional braces to modern clear aligners and pediatric interceptive care, we offer treatment options tailored to each patient’s needs.

image.alt: Types of braces offered at Coreil Orthodontics
Spark clear aligners offered at Coreil Orthodontics
Evaluation and treatment options for snoring and sleep apnea
Pediatric orthodontic therapy and early interceptive care

testimonials.testimonial: “50 years old with braces! I have a missing tooth and broken crowns and no hope for restoring my smile until I saw Dr. Coreil! Thank you doc for saving my smile! I’m smiling already!”

testimonials.author: Michele F.
testimonials.testimonial: “50 years old with braces!... Thank you doc for saving my smile! I’m smiling already!”

testimonials.author: Alexandra G.
testimonials.testimonial: “Everyone in the office is always smiling and treats you like family. You are not just another patient; they know you by name and interact with you throughout your entire appointment. I’m very lucky to have Dr Mark and his team behind my treatment!”

og_meta.title: Home - Coreil Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Coreil Orthodontics in Lafayette provides specialist-led orthodontic care including braces, clear aligners, pediatric therapy, and sleep apnea evaluation.

image.alt: Coreil Orthodontics team smiling in the office lobby

paragraphs.text: Coreil Orthodontics combines art, science, and experience to deliver orthodontic care focused on long-term function and esthetics. We plan treatment around stable tooth position and a healthy bite, not just how teeth look at the end of treatment.

Our team treats every patient like a guest in our home: we listen, explain options in plain language, and tailor care to each person’s needs and lifestyle. That personal approach helps patients feel comfortable and confident from day one.
We offer modern options, including braces and clear aligner therapy, using the latest materials and digital tools to improve efficiency and comfort throughout treatment.
By combining advanced technology, careful planning, and friendly service, we aim to deliver predictable, long-lasting results while making each visit as easy as possible for patients and families.

Dr. Mark Coreil, DDS, is a board‑certified orthodontist with decades of clinical and teaching experience. He spends focused time with each patient, explaining treatment in clear terms and measuring success by long‑term results and satisfied families.

Dr. Coreil has lectured nationally and internationally and has served as an Associate Professor of Clinical Orthodontics at Louisiana State University, sharing his clinical expertise with residents and colleagues.

image.alt: Dr. Mark Coreil in the treatment room

paragraphs.text: Doctor of Dental Surgery (DDS) — Louisiana State University School of Dentistry, 1986; Orthodontic specialty training — Louisiana State University, completed 1988; Roth/Williams Advanced Clinical Program, 1993.

Outside the office Dr. Coreil enjoys family time with his grandchildren, outdoor activities like hunting and fishing, and traveling. His Labrador retriever Sky often accompanies him to the office and brings smiles to patients of all ages.
Comprehensive orthodontics for children, teens, and adults; pediatric orthodontic therapy; craniofacial and cleft‑team cases; and clear aligner therapy for appropriately selected cases.

Dr. Coreil serves on the Children’s Hospital of New Orleans Cleft and Craniofacial Team and maintains active ties with LSU, where he has taught orthodontic residents and participated in regional clinical education.

items.bio: Tori supports treatment delivery and patient education at every visit.

items.name: Baylee Hayes
items.bio: Baylee contributes to a warm, welcoming patient experience and efficient clinical flow.

slides.alt: Treatment room with clinician greeting patient
Coreil Orthodontics team photo in office

paragraphs.text: Dr. Coreil serves on the Children’s Hospital of New Orleans Cleft and Craniofacial Team, contributing orthodontic expertise to multidisciplinary care for children with cleft and craniofacial conditions. This collaboration helps coordinate long‑term treatment planning alongside surgeons, speech therapists, and pediatric specialists.

Beyond clinical care, Dr. Coreil participates in professional education and outreach related to craniofacial care, teaching residents and hosting continuing‑education events that support high standards of local and regional patient care.

og_meta.title: About Us | Coreil Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Learn about Coreil Orthodontics, Dr. Mark Coreil, and our team's commitment to personalized orthodontic care in Lafayette, LA.

image.alt: Spark clear aligners shown with smiling woman in a bright kitchen

Get Started.title: What to expect at your first visit

paragraphs.text: The Coreil Clear experience begins with a Virtual Consultation. Send a few clear photos of your teeth from your phone and Dr. Coreil will evaluate them from home. We will discuss treatment options, estimated price, and an expected timeline by phone or over Zoom so you can choose the path that fits your life.

Typical steps: schedule a free smile assessment, start with a 3D scan to preview your future smile and build a treatment plan, receive your Spark Aligners and wear them as recommended, then watch your smile transform. Features you can expect: More Clear (https://coreilortho.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/more-clear.svg), BPA Free (https://coreilortho.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/bpa.svg), Stains Less (https://coreilortho.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/icon-coffee.svg), Faster Treatment (https://coreilortho.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/icon-speed.svg), More Comfortable (https://coreilortho.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/icon-more-comfortable.svg).

image.alt: Spark aligners close-up with smiling patient

paragraphs.text: Our goal is affordable braces and orthodontic treatment for patients in Lafayette, LA and the surrounding areas. We offer no-interest, in-house financing, discounts for payment in full and for accounts paid in two installments. Additional financing is available through CareCredit (https://www.carecredit.com/) and Alphaeon Credit (https://go.alphaeoncredit.com/practice-application/37421).

As a courtesy to our patients, we will file your insurance claims electronically. We instruct the insurance company to reimburse you directly for the portion of your fee covered by your plan, and our team will help you estimate your out-of-pocket costs before treatment begins.

To get started, request an appointment or send us your photos. Use our contact form at https://coreilortho.com/contact-us/ or the quick request anchor at https://coreilortho.com/#contact-us-home. Sending a few pictures of your teeth with your iPhone can replace an initial office visit; click the Virtual Smile Consultation tab to begin the virtual intake and receive personalized feedback from Dr. Coreil.

image.alt: Schedule your consultation at Coreil Orthodontics

seo.page_keywords: Coreil Orthodontics, virtual consultation, new patient, Spark Aligners, financing, Lafayette LA

og_meta.title: Get Started | Coreil Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Schedule a Virtual Smile Consultation, send photos from your phone, and learn about financing options with Coreil Orthodontics.

image.alt: Smiling patients of all ages at Lakeshore Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: The best time for orthodontic treatment is now. Patients of all ages, including adults in their 70s, choose braces to improve function and confidence — and retainers keep those results long term.
Durable and cost-effective, metal braces use brackets and wires to gently move teeth into their ideal positions.
Ceramic braces blend with tooth color for a less noticeable option while delivering effective results.

image.alt: Close up of metal braces for orthodontic treatment

paragraphs.text: We offer clear aligner options, including the Spark Clear Aligner System. Spark aligners use TruGEN™ material and are designed to be more clear, comfortable, and stain-resistant while efficiently moving teeth.
The clear-aligner journey usually begins with a virtual consultation and a 3D scan so you can preview your treatment plan and timeline.
More clear, BPA free, stain less, faster treatment, and improved comfort compared with older aligner materials.
Start with a free smile assessment, get a 3D scan, receive your aligners, and follow the treatment plan to see progressive improvement.
Invisalign4 is offered as a discreet, removable approach to shifting teeth. Treatments begin with a consultation and 3D imaging and include retainers afterward to protect your result.
Aligners let you brush and floss normally and avoid bracket restrictions while delivering predictable movement for many adult and teen cases.

image.alt: Invisalign aligner being placed on teeth

paragraphs.text: Sleep apnea affects millions and can raise risks for high blood pressure, heart problems, stroke, and daytime drowsiness. We evaluate and treat snoring and sleep-disordered breathing as part of comprehensive care.

Early evaluation helps us guide jaw growth and treat problems when they are most responsive. We recommend timely assessments and coordinate care with pediatric dentists and ENT specialists when needed.

image.alt: Dr. Mark Coreil greeting a young patient

paragraphs.text: Facial pain and headaches linked to bite issues are treated conservatively. We often start with stabilization splints, physical therapy, and exercises, then develop a plan to maintain long-term relief.
Retention is essential. Custom retainers, removable or fixed, help teeth settle into their new positions and protect your investment in treatment.
Most patients wear retainers full time at first, then nightly long term to maintain alignment.

image.alt: Young woman holding an orthodontic retainer

paragraphs.text: Airway evaluation is part of our comprehensive exam. We consider airway health when planning treatments so orthodontics can support better breathing and sleep when indicated.
